## Ethical Compliance

- [ ] CHK001 Respects robots.txt and implements appropriate delays
- [ ] CHK002 Complies with website terms of service

## Anti-Detection Measures

- [ ] CHK005 Handles Cloudflare bypass correctly
- [ ] CHK006 Supports proxy configuration and system proxy detection
